channel.title: Lifestyle Archives - The New Vibes
channel.description: Your source for the latest trends in business, Technology, Marketing, Lifestyle, Candid Vibez, Energy, and Health. With our fresh perspective and innovative approach, we bring you the insights and inspiration you need to thrive and be more productive in today's fast-paced world. Join our community and start creating the future you want today wherever you find yourself!

item.title: Whooping Cough And Mental Health: What You Need To Know
item.dc:creator: Joseph Anim Darko
item.description:
Have you ever heard of whooping cough? Also known as pertussis, this respiratory infection is highly contagious and can cause lengthy and repeated bouts of coughing. But did you know that whooping cough can also have an impact on mental health? In this article, we will explore what whooping cough is, its impacts on...

item.title: Rich Kid, Poor Kid

item.description:

item.description:

item.title: Why Laughter is the Best Medicine: The Science Behind It
item.dc:creator: Joseph Anim Darko
item.description:
It’s often been said that laughter is the best medicine, and there’s actually scientific evidence to support this claim. item.title: How To Stay Health While Binge-Watching Your Favorite TV Shows

item.description:

item.title: 10 Health Benefits of Playing Video Games
